experience.title: Product Engineering Intern
experience.description: ( Received a Pre-Placement Offer )• Built a Web App that generates source code and Dockerfile for the CRUD Web App from app specs provided by the user• Developed a JSON Editor which handled JSON parsing and JSON validating for generating Web Apps with NPM• Integrated CSV file upload to populate generated Web app with CSV data and built frontend using ReactJS, MaterialUI• Built execution coordinator and critical logic to generate source code, zip it in a downloadable file, and store it in the database• Built backend in NodeJs and MongoDB which handled user system and stored previously generated apps of users
experience.description_html: ( Received a Pre-Placement Offer )• Built a Web App that generates source code and Dockerfile for the CRUD Web App from app specs provided by the user• Developed a JSON Editor which handled JSON parsing and JSON validating for generating Web Apps with NPM• Integrated CSV file upload to populate generated Web app with CSV data and built frontend using ReactJS, MaterialUI• Built execution coordinator and critical logic to generate source code, zip it in a downloadable file, and store it in the database• Built backend in NodeJs and MongoDB which handled user system and stored previously generated apps of users

experience.title: Software Development Intern
experience.description: • Developed various features for the website to improve the user experience using React, NodeJS, and PostgreSQL• Designed and Built the Admin Panel frontend with ReactJS in order to improve the user experience of the Ops Team• Delivered successfully RESTful APIs using NodeJS and PostgreSQL and integrated them with the frontend in React• Implemented a Video Calling feature to increase patient-doctor engagement by using Twilio Javascript SDK• Integrated Payments feature with Razorpay API and also facilitated Google Analytics to help the research of Ops Team
experience.description_html: • Developed various features for the website to improve the user experience using React, NodeJS, and PostgreSQL• Designed and Built the Admin Panel frontend with ReactJS in order to improve the user experience of the Ops Team• Delivered successfully RESTful APIs using NodeJS and PostgreSQL and integrated them with the frontend in React• Implemented a Video Calling feature to increase patient-doctor engagement by using Twilio Javascript SDK• Integrated Payments feature with Razorpay API and also facilitated Google Analytics to help the research of Ops Team
